Welcome to Vibe's documentation!
================================

**Vibe** (/vaÉªb/) is a Python library to process data from vibration.
*Feel the vibe of a Railway!*

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

   .. image:: ./images/production.jpg
      :align: left
      :scale: 25 %

   :caption: Contents:
